title: Balcony Grille, 1909–11
provenance: Early 1980s: purchased from Sotheby's London, 17 rue Fontaine or 8-10 rue Agar, Paris; 2011: acquired by Museum from private collector, New York, NY (from Lillian Nassau LLC)
dimensions: H x W x D: 50.8 x 83.8 x 4cm (20 in. x 33 in. x 3/4 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from the Members' Acquisitions Fund of Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum
description: Rectangular form with slightly bowed outline with two panels of curvilinear scrolls ending in foliate motifs.

tombstone.epitaph: Balcony Grille, 1909–11. Cast iron. Museum purchase from the Members' Acquisitions Fund of Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum. 2011-28-1.
